reusability: The architecture design of small language models can be used for other AI applications.
Data augmentation methods can enhance model performance.
The evaluation process can be applied to different tasks.
limitations: The model's generalization ability is insufficient.
The computational power requirements are relatively high.

limitations: La capacidad de generalización del modelo es insuficiente.
